name: GlowMine
description:
Another Speedrunning Platformer! Be warned, this game is not easy. I did everything myself, and tested the game to make sure its beatable.

Controls: Arrow Keys for Movement, Spacebar for Jump, V and B to change colors.

Leaderboard                                        100% Leaderboard (all 9 pickaxes collected)
